dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Decision Making Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach making decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and facts to make informed decisions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instincts and personal feelings to guide their decision-making process.

dimensions.label: Problem Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach solving problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use logical reasoning and methodical steps to solve problems.
Your FarTwin will think outside the box and explore innovative solutions to problems.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing and sociable, enjoying the company of others.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key environments and may need time alone to recharge.

dimensions.label: Growth Mindset
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning and growth?

options.description: Your FarTwin will have a positive attitude towards challenges and view them as opportunities for growth.
Your FarTwin may struggle with self-doubt and negativity, making it harder to learn from mistakes.

dimensions.label: Career Goals
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach their career?

options.description: Your FarTwin will set high goals for themselves and work hard to achieve them.
Your FarTwin may not have a clear sense of direction or may be content with a more laid-back approach to their career.

dimensions.label: Emotional Intelligence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be in touch with their own emotions and be able to recognize and regulate them.
Your FarTwin may struggle with managing their emotions, leading to impulsive decisions or outbursts.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be able to manage their time effectively, prioritizing tasks and meeting deadlines.
Your FarTwin may struggle with procrastination and delay completing tasks, leading to missed opportunities.
